already_subscribed: You're already subscribed. If you haven't been receiving updates, contact me and we'll figure it out.

unsubscribe_success.title: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe_success.message:
- Randall Munroe, xkcd ([CC BY-NC 2.5](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/2.5/))

Or was that a mistake? You can [resubscribe](/blog/subscribe/)!

unsubscribe_error.title: 418 Error: I'm a teapot
unsubscribe_error.message:
<article>

# 418 Error: I'm a teapot

_The resulting entity body may be short and stout_

We're honestly not sure what went wrong, but evidence suggests that you tried to brew coffee in a teapot. Make sure you got here by clicking "Unsubscribe" in one of my emails. If that doesn't work, [contact me](/contact/) and I'll try to work it out.</article>
